title: Rambo Rental Bikes is looking for developing a system to calculate the rentals of the bikes. System should accept the customer details, bike details and calculate the rental charges. System allows users to add customer details with bike rented. It computes rent for each customer. Systems displays the Bike details with summation of days of hire and rental payment. FUNCTIONALITY AND TASK Define a class called Mobike with the following description: Instance variables/data members: BikeNumber – to store the bike’s number PhoneNumber – to store the phone number of the customer Name – to store the name of the customer Days – to store the number of days the bike is taken on rent o charge – to calculate and store the rental charge Member methods: void Compute( ) – to compute the rental charge Bike No. PhoneNo No. of days Charge The rent for a mobike is charged on the following basis: First five days Rs 500 per day Next five days Rs 400 per day Rest of the days Rs 200 per day Note use get this Data @param ES6 class Exports BikeNo,Phone,Noofdays and Charge.
